Class SFDCAccessControlException

Exception
    SFDCAccessControlException

public class SFDCAccessControlException

This class provides access control exception functionality. You might not want to expose the details of the exception to the users. Note : to avoid XSS, make sure to escape text before presenting it to the user.

Enum Summary
SFDCAccessControlException.ExceptionReason
          ExceptionReason - this enum defines the different reasons for the exception type.
SFDCAccessControlException.ExceptionType
          ExceptionType - this enum defines the different types of Access Control exceptions.
